Scouting

Scouting has and is still changing since I was a member of the BSA, but regardless of the minor changes it makes it will always hold a special place in my heart because I grew up in it and am an Eagle Scout. For anyone that doesn't know what scouting is, I will elaborate on it and why it was and still is important for me as an individual, but understand that achieving the rank of Eagle isn't an easy task.

What is Scouting

Scouting or the Scout Movement is a movement with a strong focus on the outdoors and survival skills that aims to support young people in their physical, mental, and spiritual development so that they may play constructive roles in society.

Why it is important to me

I was in the scouting program for eleven years. I've made countless memories and freinds that otherwise would have never been possible; it's brought me across and out of the country; and scouting has taught me leadership skills that I otherwise wouldn't have obtained.

Some of The More Memorable Things I've Done:

  • Obtained the rank of Eagle Scout in 2016
  • Staff member of NYLT MTC-007 (Nation Youth Leadership Training)
  • Went to the Caribbean Scout Jamboree of 2014
  • Went to the National Scout Jamboree of 2013
